abstrac: I am a native English-speaking freelance marketeer and writer from the UK with extensive B2B & B2C marketing experience. I take a friendly, consultative and 'can-do' approach to my clients!
bio:
A driven marketing professional with 16+ years' digital marketing experience in a variety of sectors including IT and software, real estate, food production, manufacturing, sports, and retail. 

My main skills are email marketing, blogs and articles, website copy, SEO optimisation, and social media management and content. I also enjoy working on integrated marketing campaigns and planning them from scratch, from understanding my customers' objectives through to executing the campaign and analysing the results afterwards. 

I am happy to provide examples of my work or jump on a call to discuss any questions you may have. I look forward to the prospect of working with you!

I work with customers in the UK, US, Australia, South Africa, Canada and Israel, so I'm happy to work on different timezones and business cultures as required.

I'm comfortable working with most SaaS-based marketing automation tools including SendInBlue, Mailchimp, Pardot, Salesforce, Zoho, Hubspot, Oktopost, Buffer, Hootsuite, etc. I can either make recommendations based on client requirements if you don't have a martech stack in place. I am also willing to skill up on new platforms at my own expense if you use existing tools I do not have experience with. 

My payment terms are flexible according to my customers and their projects. I also have a network of skilled freelancers I can call upon depending on the client's requirements and if more technical skills are required for a website build project for example.

abstrac: Dr. Mike - From Ideas to Implementations
bio:
AetherMachines Inc. (www.aethermachines.com) is an 'ideas to implementations' technical creativity company employing Dr. Mike Moore (the Company's doctoral level principal). Beginning with a conceptual/mathematical understanding of the problem, we apply of 'analysis-synthesis' to find intuitive solutions, and applied creativity to bring the solution into being.

Dr. Mike's LinkedIn page (highlight URL, right click, click goto) - 30+ years experience in the R&D, design, making, testing, and documentation loop:

https://www.linkedin.com/in/drmichaeldmoore/

- R&D: Mathematical models, simulations, static and dynamic calculations, SPICE, EASY5x, state space and Laplace systems, real time hardware in the loop, Mathematica, Scipy/Numpy/Sympy, Scilab, MATLAB/Simulink

- Design/Hardware: Analog and digital circuits, a myriad of sensors, a wide range of embedded uPs, controls, actuators, drones, robotics, mechanical parts and FEM analysis, 1-8 layer PCBs including HDMI and HDI, I2C, SPI, CAN and serial circuits, RF and radio control, Arduino/Mega, RPi, Beagle Bone, LPCxxx, MC68HCxx, SNo and FPGAs, laser and ultrasonics

- Design/Software: Real time assembly, embedded C and Python/MicroPython, Windows apps, DSP, speech processing, PIDs and control systems, Kalman filters, specialty deterministic and stochastic routines and algorithms

- Make: In house and vendor SMT and through hole PCBs (100s to 1000s to date), metal, plastic and carbon fiber CNC, 3D printing

- Test: Power and DC/DC circuits, analog circuits, digital circuits, I2C, SPI, serial, CAN, RF circuits, servos, actuators, frequency response, control responses, algorithm testing and validation

 - Document: Author/named inventor on 10+ U.S. and foreign patents, multiple IEEE and peer reviewed technical publications, users and maintenance manuals, Mathematica and Jupyter notebooks


3 year NDA *.pdf (highlight URL, right click, click goto):

http://www.aethermachines.com/AEMACH-090817-3YearGuruMNDA-0001-B.pdf

When contacted through Guru.com, AetherMachines only uses Guru Safe Pay Escrow and the Project Agreement process - no exceptions! 

Employer IP and NDAs
A Guru.com specific mutual NDA link is available above and shown below. In general, Dr. Mike will only consider NDAs with specific term and terminations (1-5 years). 

Employers wishing to use NDAs in Guru projects are encouraged to do the following to properly protect core Employer intellectual property (IP):

1. Use Provisional (1 year) and Regular (up to 20 year) patents for core IP protection and idea documentation, ideally prior to the Guru project
2. Enumerate specific, enforceable terms and terminations (1-5 years) in any NDA for the project
3. Specifically enumerate any Trade Secrets (which can be covered by a perpetual clause in an NDA, given proper Employer/Freelancer diligence) contemplated for the project, by name, in any perpetuity clause

porfolio.title: Data Entry: Twitter posting of links

abstrac: I aim to provide satisfactory service to all my clients for every job offered to me by meeting all the required tasks in a timely manner.
bio:
I have previous experience with various VA tasks like web research, lead generation, linkedin, data mining, etc. through Upwork. I can also be available through skype-chat or through email for communication.

I am available to work once hired and I am open to accept a short paid trial-task anytime.

Here are some of my online experiences and projects through Upwork.

1. “Lead Generation” 
I have to research for paid events in a given list of cities in the USA, Canada and UK. Then I have to gather 2 contact persons' name, email address and title that are the decision makers of the company and of the events like CEO, President, Owner, titles with Marketing, communications, development, event coordinator, event manager, event director, etc. Information are entered in a google spreadsheet.

2. "Research/Data Entry Professional Needed for Forum Research”
My client provided me with keywords like audi, aquarium, sneakers and many more. I have to search on Facebook groups with that keyword on their group name. I will input information of groups in the USA with that keyword in a google spreadsheet including the number of members, type of group (closed/open) and the URL of the group page. Then, I go to USA forum sites. Forum sites has to be forums that sells, swaps, trade the products/things that we are looking for using the keywords example audi, aquarium, sneakers and many more,

3. "Linkedin Contact Research" I have to research in Linkedin and collect names, email address and possible contact number for CEO/President/CTO/COO/CMO from a given list of companies/businesses. Then information I’ve gathered are then entered in an excel file.
 
4. "Real Estate Research" My client sends the list of Real Estate Title Insurance Companies in a given State in the USA. I will have to do web research, lead generation and data entry on the project. I have to find the Owner or Manager of each location of each company if available with their contact information.
Flexible time, weekly payment terms, email, skype chat, hangout chat.

abstrac: Writer with a passion for language offers comprehensive services.
bio: Working as the editing/proofreading half of a prolific writing team has sharpened skills gained from a Master's degree in literature combined with over thirty years teaching at the college level.  I relish diving into projects to help writers sharpen their voices and skills.

We can discuss terms for your project.  I offer services beginning with simple proofreading for errors ranging through simple editing for flow and voice up to extensive collaboration to bring your rough copy to a final product ready for publication. In all cases I am willing to produce a small portion of your project for your approval before we finalize our agreement.
